titleStmt.title: The answer of Judge Jenkins, to the imputation put upon his plea in Chancerie; which was read in open court the 14 of Februarie, 1647. / And avowed by David Jenkins, prisoner in Newgate.
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.

notesStmt.note: Regarding a suit by a Mr. Erneley of Wilshire, touching the estate of Jenkins's great-uncle, a Mr. Thomas of Glamorganshire.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb. 19", "1647"; the 8 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
